name: ContactForm
description: Complete contact form component with tag, animated title and description, email signup form, and terms text.

description.example: Get the latest updates and exclusive content delivered to your inbox

termsText.default: By clicking Sign Up you're confirming that you agree with our Terms and Conditions.
termsText.example: We respect your privacy. Unsubscribe anytime.

propsSchema.title: string (required)
propsSchema.termsText?: string (default: 'By clicking Sign Up you're confirming that you agree with our Terms and Conditions.')

usageExample: <ContactForm title="Join our newsletter" description="Get updates" tag="Newsletter" useInvertedBackground="noInvert" onSubmit={(email) => console.log(email)} />
